doc.title: Le vidangeur
doc.plot: Le Vidangeur is a film about an eclectic artist who creates a melange of bizarre situations, gets lost chasing big city dreams, and is mesmerized by a mysterious tatooed woman. His garbage route is a journey toward his identity and self-acceptance. It is a film matching urban attitude and self-acceptance. It is a film matching urban attitude against the reality of human spirit and the natural drive for conformity. It questions how free we are as individuals.
